comments.text:
FOG provides a Rust API and thus it would like to get to the values stored in a datetime.
Internally glean-core stores these as `DateTime<FixedOffset>`s and converts it to a JSON-encoded representation for `test_get_value`.

We should expose this type for FOG to consume
comments.creator: chutten@mozilla.com
comments.author: chutten@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
FOG provides a Rust API and thus it would like to get to the values stored in a datetime.
Internally glean-core stores these as `DateTime<FixedOffset>`s and converts it to a JSON-encoded representation for `test_get_value`.

We should expose this type for FOG to consume
